pr_title: NMS-12460: Merged poll and test command

timeline.message: NMS-12460: Merged poll and test command

timeline.bodyText:
Can you use SessionUtils instead?
Using TransactionOperations may result in weird bundle states when bundle:watch * is enabled or a bundle is trying to refresh.
timeline.author: mvrueden

timeline.bodyText:
What about changing the description to reflect the two purposes of the command?
I'm thinking about something like this:
Used to invoke a monitor against a host at a specific location, or to test a service monitor definition from a given poller package.
timeline.author: agalue
